article.headline: Prairie View 74, Grambling St. 58
article.story: PRAIRIE VIEW, Texas -- Tim Meadows had 19 points and 15 rebounds Monday night to lead Prairie View A&M to a 74-58 victory over Grambling State. Christopher Jones and Brandon Webb had 15 points each for the Panthers (13-10, 8-4 SWAC). Prairie View led 36-29 at halftime and held a double-digit lead for most of the second half. Lance Fuertado scored 19 points to lead the Tigers (6-15, 4-9). Ariece Perkins added 12, all in the second half, for Grambling State. Prairie View was 29-of-38 (76 percent) from the free-throw line and outrebounded the Tigers 48-26. Grambling State led 20-14 midway through the first half but the Panthers scored nine straight points to take the lead for good.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
